##a. Stat the claim to be tested and define the population parameter of interest
###Claim: Adults should sleep at least 8 hours each night.
###Population Parameter of interest: Statistics stufents of the first day of class.
##B.  State and symbolize the null (H0) and alternative (H1) hypotheses.
###Ho - Adults sleep at least 8 hours each night. H0 >= 8
###H1 - Adults sleep less than 8 hours each night. H1 < 8
##C.  What type of one-sample t test do you need to conduct?
###. Right tailed

```{r}
summary(sleepclass)
hist(hoursOfSleep)
boxplot(hoursOfSleep)
qqnorm(hoursOfSleep)
qqline(hoursOfSleep)
shapiro.test(hoursOfSleep)

```
